archimate:BusinessObject.name: Acquisition strategy
archimate:BusinessObject.documentation: Approaches, schedules, resources, and specific considerations required to acquire system elements. May also include inputs to determine acquisition constraints

properties.value: Die Beschaffungsstrategie umfasst die Vorgehensweisen, Zeitpläne, Ressourcen und konkrete Überlegungen, um Systemelemente zu beschaffen. Sie kann auch Eingaben beinhalten, um beschaffungsbedingte Einschränkungen des Systems festzulegen.
Approaches, schedules, resources, and specific considerations required to acquire system elements. May also include inputs to determine acquisition constraints
